title: Termination for Cause
short_summary: Material breach after 30-day cure. Includes: SLA failures 3+ months, security negligence, compliance failures. Full refund + direct damages.

title: Termination for Convenience
short_summary: 90 days notice. 25% early termination fee—waived if vendor breach.

title: SLA Tier-1 Critical
short_summary: 99.99% uptime (max 52min/year). Credits NOT exclusive remedy if downtime >4hrs in 30 days—direct damages allowed.

title: SLA Tier-2 Essential
short_summary: 99.95% uptime. Service credits ARE exclusive remedy for Tier-2.

title: Disaster Recovery
short_summary: 500-mile geographic redundancy. RPO 15min, RTO 1hr. Quarterly failover testing REQUIRED—failure to test = material breach.

title: Data Security
short_summary: SOC2, ISO27001 required. Vendor liable for breaches from negligence.

title: Incident Notification
short_summary: Must notify within 4 HOURS. Failure = material breach + enhanced indemnification.

title: Liability Cap
short_summary: Capped at greater of 24-month fees or $10M.

title: Liability Exclusions
short_summary: Cap DOES NOT apply to: security breaches from negligence, regulatory fines, indemnification, willful misconduct, confidentiality breach.

title: Vendor Indemnification
short_summary: Vendor indemnifies for: security breaches, regulatory actions from vendor failures, data breach costs, third-party claims.

title: Data Export
short_summary: Customer can export anytime. 60 days free assistance post-termination.

title: Audit Rights
short_summary: Annual audits + immediate audit after any security incident. Docs within 10 days.

title: Force Majeure
short_summary: No relief if event foreseeable OR vendor failed reasonable contingency. Does not excuse security notification.

title: Billing Accuracy
short_summary: Disputed charges within 60 days. Intentional overbilling = material breach.

title: Regulatory Cooperation
short_summary: Full cooperation with exams. Docs within 10 business days.
